Ways of working

How we work together and the activities we do.

Competitor benchmarking

Understanding how other products are approaching the same problem.

Lean user personas

Personas are extremely helpful when designing products and services, helping stakeholders (and designers) keep the users in mind and see the problem from their perspective.

Empathy maps

Aid decision making and create a shared understanding of a user by visualising user insights in a clear, understandable artefact.

Stakeholder interviews

Lean UX

Customer Journey Maps

A collaborative session to bring together your customers thoughts, feelings and mindsets for each point of your journey into a living artefact.
